text: Susan Brooks Thistlethwaite (born 1948) is an author, former president of Chicago Theological Seminary, a syndicated columnist, ordained minister, activist, theologian, and translator of the Bible. She has a Ph.D. from Duke University and is an ordained minister of the United Church of Christ. ==References== Category:Living people Category:American theologians Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:1948 births Category:Seminary presidents Category:Duke University alumni Category:United Church of Christ ministers Category:Smith College alumni
title: Susan Brooks Thistlethwaite
